isDefined

public abstract boolean isDefined()
Description copied from interface: DynamicObject2D
return true if the object is well defined. For example, the intersection point between two lines can be undefined if lines are parallel.

getAncestors

public abstract java.lang.Object[] getAncestors()
Description copied from interface: DynamicObject2D
Return the objects whose change directly affect this shape. Ancestors will mostly be instances of Shape2D, but we can imagine dependance to other kind of objects.
